titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3100) to authorize international security and development assistance programs and Peace Corps programs for fiscal years 1988 and 1989, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-404.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 316 - 97 (Record Vote No: 416).

bill.summary: 10/27/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3100 (foreign assistance programs).
